resources.string: Before uploading the logfile, you have to configure the algorithm.
An error has occurred. Please try again.
The logfile was uploaded successfully! Thank you!
Do you want to enable it?
Hi!\n\nWe kindly ask you to take a few minutes to configure this app.

To run the app, you need to install the Google Play Services component from Google Play Store.\n\nPlease, click the button below to install it. Once you have installed this component, you will be able to continue with the configuration. Thank you!

To correctly run the app, you need to update the Google Play Services component from Google Play Store.\n\nPlease, click the button below to update it. Once you have updated this component, you will be able to continue with the configuration. Thank you!

To run the app, you need to enable the Google Play Services component.\n\nPlease, click the button below to go to device\'s settings and enable it. Once you have enabled this component, you will be able to continue with the configuration. Thank you!

Consider a typical day.
What are the time slots in which you do exercise/steps?

The next step will help you to setting these time slots.
Choose a color and then set the time slots
You need to set all the time slots

Thank you!

The app has been configured according to your specifications.
If you think you've done something wrong, don't worry: it is smart!

Start playing now!
